lines.text: Looks like sodey pop - watch it fizz.
There's something kind of eeEEEEeeehh about a kid that's never played baseball.

[after Junior finds him far from the box he hid in]
But boy. Over there! I know, I know. Figures don't lie. But... one side boy!

[goes to check the box he hid in]
Nah, I better not look. I just might be in there.
